languages.text: {n}Маражай медлит, не решаясь продолжить. Затем приближается и, чуть склонясь, заглядывает вам в глаза. Его голос чуть подрагивает.{/n} "Когда мы только... начинали, я считал все это небольшой игрой — возможностью прогнать скуку в окружении мон-кай тем, чтобы разделить с од{mf|ним|ной} из них подлинные страсти эльдаров. Я ожидал, что очень быстро твое слабое мон-кайское сердце не вынесет моих истин и ты сбежишь, а я получу новый повод изводить тебя... и тем не менее — ты здесь. И я вижу в твоих глазах ту же одержимость, что движет мной. Невероятно". {n}Голос друкари падает до шепота.{/n}

{n}Marazhai hesitates for a moment, weighing his next words. Then he draws closer, leaning down slightly, and looks into your eyes. There is a subtle tremor to his voice.{/n} "When we first... began, I thought this was all a little game — a chance to stave off the boredom of being among the mon-keigh by sharing the true passions of the Aeldari with one of them. I thought your mon-keigh heart would quickly flounder under the weight of my truths and you would flee, and then I would have a new reason to torment you... and yet here you are. And I see in your eyes the same obsession that drives me. Incredible." {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n}

И я вижу в твоих глазах ту же одержимость, что движет мной. Невероятно". {n}Голос друкари падает до шепота.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋犹豫片刻，仿佛在斟酌接下来要说的话。随后他走近你，微微俯下身，直视着你的双眼。他的声音带着一丝几不可察的颤动。{/n}“在我们第一次……开始的时候，我本以为这只是一场小小的游戏——与猴子分享艾达灵族真正的激情，来消遣身处猴群之中的无趣。我本以为，猴子的心灵无法承受我所袒露的真相，会在重压之下分崩离析，对我避之不及，好让我找到更多的理由来折磨你……然而，你却依然在我身边，而我在你的眼中看到了与我一样的痴迷。这真是不可思议。”{n}说到这里，玛拉斋的声音已低沉如呢喃。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hesitates for a moment, weighing his next words. Then he draws closer, leaning down slightly, and looks into your eyes. There is a subtle tremor to his voice.{/n} "When we first... began, I thought this was all a little game — a chance to stave off the boredom of being among the mon-keigh by sharing the true passions of the Aeldari with one of them. I thought your mon-keigh heart would quickly flounder under the weight of my truths and you would flee, and then I would have a new reason to torment you... and yet here you are. And I see in your eyes the same obsession that drives me. Incredible." {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n}

{n}玛拉斋犹豫片刻，仿佛在斟酌接下来要说的话。随后他走近你，微微俯下身，直视着你的双眼。他的声音带着一丝几不可察的颤动。{/n}“在我们第一次……开始的时候，我本以为这只是一场小小的游戏——与猴子分享艾达灵族真正的激情，来消遣身处猴群之中的无趣。我本以为，猴子那颗脆弱的心灵无法承受我所袒露的真相，会在重压之下分崩离析，对我避之不及，好让我找到更多的理由来折磨你……然而，你却依然在我身边，而我在你的眼中看到了与我一样的痴迷。这真是不可思议。”{n}说到这里，玛拉斋的声音已低沉如呢喃。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vacila unos instantes, buscando las palabra adecuadas. Luego se aproxima a ti, se inclina hacia delante y te mira directamente a los ojos. Hay un sutil temblor en su voz.{/n} «Cuando... empezamos, creí que todo esto no era más que un simple juego, una oportunidad para combatir el tedio que supone estar entre mon-keigh compartiendo con {mf|uno|una} de ellos las auténticas pasiones de los Aeldari. Creí que tu corazón de mon-keigh no resistiría el peso de mis verdades y huirías {mf|espantado|espantada}, y que eso me daría un nuevo motivo para atormentarte... pero aquí sigues. Y veo en tu mirada la misma obsesión que me impulsa a mí. Es increíble». {n}Baja la voz hasta hablar entre susurros.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hesitates for a moment, weighing his next words. Then he draws closer, leaning down slightly, and looks into your eyes. There is a subtle tremor to his voice.{/n} "When we first... began, I thought this was all a little game — a chance to stave off the boredom of being among the mon-keigh by sharing the true passions of the Aeldari with one of them. I thought your mon-keigh heart would quickly flounder under the weight of my truths and you would flee, and then I would have a new reason to torment you... and yet here you are. And I see in your eyes the same obsession that drives me. Incredible." {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vacila unos instantes, buscando las palabra adecuadas. Luego se aproxima a ti, se inclina hacia delante y te mira directamente a los ojos. Hay un sutil temblor en su voz.{/n} «Cuando... empezamos, creí que todo esto no era más que un simple juego, una oportunidad para combatir el tedio que supone estar entre mon-keigh compartiendo con {mf|uno|una} de ellos las auténticas pasiones de los Aeldari. Creí que tu débil corazón de mon-keigh no resistiría el peso de mis verdades y huirías {mf|espantado|espantada}, y que eso me daría un nuevo motivo para atormentarte... pero aquí sigues. Y veo en tu mirada la misma obsesión que me impulsa a mí. Es increíble». {n}Baja la voz hasta hablar entre susurros.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai hésite quelques instants, choisissant ses mots avec soin. Il s'approche finalement de vous, se penche légèrement et plante ses yeux dans les vôtres. Vous percevez un tremblement ténu dans sa voix.{/n} « Quand nous avons... commencé, je croyais qu'il ne s'agissait que d'un jeu. Je pensais pouvoir oublier l'ennui engendré par la compagnie des mon-keigh en partageant les véritables passions des Aeldaris avec {mf|l'un|l'une} d'entre eux. Je pensais que votre cœur de mon-keigh ne serait pas de taille à affronter ma réalité et que vous préféreriez fuir, me donnant ainsi une autre raison de vous tourmenter... Pourtant, vous êtes toujours à mes côtés. Et dans vos yeux, je lis une obsession identique à la mienne. C'est incroyable... » {n}Sa voix se réduit à un murmure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hesitates for a moment, weighing his next words. Then he draws closer, leaning down slightly, and looks into your eyes. There is a subtle tremor to his voice.{/n} "When we first... began, I thought this was all a little game — a chance to stave off the boredom of being among the mon-keigh by sharing the true passions of the Aeldari with one of them. I thought your mon-keigh heart would quickly flounder under the weight of my truths and you would flee, and then I would have a new reason to torment you... and yet here you are. And I see in your eyes the same obsession that drives me. Incredible." {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n}

Je pensais pouvoir oublier l'ennui engendré par la compagnie des mon-keigh en partageant les véritables passions des Aeldaris avec {mf|l'un|l'une} d'entre eux. Je pensais que votre cœur de mon-keigh ne serait pas de taille à affronter ma réalité et que vous préféreriez fuir, me donnant ainsi une autre raison de vous tourmenter... Pourtant, vous êtes toujours à mes côtés. Et dans vos yeux, je lis une obsession identique à la mienne. C'est incroyable... » {n}Sa voix se réduit à un murmure.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai zögert kurz und wägt seine Worte ab. Dann rückt er näher an dich heran, beugt sich leicht vor und blickt dir in die Augen. Du hörst ein leichtes Zittern in seiner Stimme.{/n} "Als wir ... unser Spiel begannen, dachte ich, es wäre nur genau das – ein kleines Spiel, eine Chance, meiner Langeweile unter euch Chem-Pan-Sey zu begegnen, indem ich mit einem von ihnen die wahren Leidenschaften der Aeldari teile. Ich war mir sicher, dass Euer Chem-Pan-Sey-Herz rasch unter der Schwere meiner Wahrheiten untergehen würde und Ihr fliehen würdet, sodass ich dann einen neuen Grund hätte, Euch zu quälen ... und doch seid Ihr hier. Und ich kann an Euren Augen die gleiche Besessenheit ablesen, die auch mich antreibt. Unglaublich." {n}Seine Stimme senkt sich zu einem Flüstern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hesitates for a moment, weighing his next words. Then he draws closer, leaning down slightly, and looks into your eyes. There is a subtle tremor to his voice.{/n} "When we first... began, I thought this was all a little game — a chance to stave off the boredom of being among the mon-keigh by sharing the true passions of the Aeldari with one of them. I thought your mon-keigh heart would quickly flounder under the weight of my truths and you would flee, and then I would have a new reason to torment you... and yet here you are. And I see in your eyes the same obsession that drives me. Incredible." {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n}

Ich war mir sicher, dass Euer schwaches Chem-Pan-Sey-Herz rasch unter der Schwere meiner Wahrheiten untergehen würde und Ihr fliehen würdet, sodass ich dann einen neuen Grund hätte, Euch zu quälen ... und doch seid Ihr hier. Und ich kann an Euren Augen die gleiche Besessenheit ablesen, die auch mich antreibt. Unglaublich." {n}Seine Stimme senkt sich zu einem Flüstern.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはしばらくためらい、次の言葉を考えている。そしてわずかに身を乗り出して近づいてくると、あなたの目を見つめた。彼の声はかすかに震えている。{/n}「最初に…始めたときは、ちょっとした遊びのつもりだった。モン＝ケイの誰かとアエルダリの真の情熱をわかち合うことで、モン＝ケイの中にいるって退屈をしのごうとしたってわけさ。お前のモン＝ケイとしての心は、俺の真実の重みに耐えかね、たちまち壊れて逃げ出すだろうと思っていた。そして俺がお前を苦しめる新たな理由が見つかるだろうと思っていたんだ…だってのに、お前は今ここにいる。そしてその目には、俺を突き動かすのと同じ執念が見える。実に素晴らしいな」{n}彼の声はささやくように小さいものになる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hesitates for a moment, weighing his next words. Then he draws closer, leaning down slightly, and looks into your eyes. There is a subtle tremor to his voice.{/n} "When we first... began, I thought this was all a little game — a chance to stave off the boredom of being among the mon-keigh by sharing the true passions of the Aeldari with one of them. I thought your mon-keigh heart would quickly flounder under the weight of my truths and you would flee, and then I would have a new reason to torment you... and yet here you are. And I see in your eyes the same obsession that drives me. Incredible." {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはしばらくためらい、次の言葉を考えている。そしてわずかに身を乗り出して近づいてくると、あなたの目を見つめた。彼の声はかすかに震えている。{/n}「最初に…始めたときは、ちょっとした遊びのつもりだった。モン＝ケイの誰かとアエルダリの真の情熱をわかち合うことで、モン＝ケイの中にいるって退屈をしのごうとしたってわけさ。お前のモン＝ケイとしての心は、俺の真実の重みに耐えかね、たちまち壊れて逃げ出すだろうと思っていた。そして俺がお前を苦しめる新たな理由が見つかるだろうと思っていたんだ…だってのに、お前は今ここにいる。そしてその目には、俺を突き動かすのと同じ執念が見える。実に素晴らしいな」{n}彼の声はささやくように小さいものになる。{/n}

{n}マラズハイはしばらくためらい、次の言葉を考える。そして、少し身を乗り出して近づき、あなたの目を見つめる。彼の声はかすかに震えていた。{/n}「最初に…始めたときは、ちょっとした遊びのつもりだった。モン＝ケイの仲の誰かとアエルダリの真の情熱を分かち合うことで、モン＝ケイの中にいる退屈をしのごうとしたってわけだ。お前の弱々しいモン＝ケイの心は、俺の真実の重みに耐えかねて、たちまち壊れて逃げ出すだろうと思っていた。そして、俺がお前を苦しめる新たな理由が見つかるだろうと思っていた…それでも、お前は今ここにいる。そしてその目には、俺を突き動かすのと同じ執念が見える。信じられん」{n}彼の声はささやくように小さくなった。{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hesitates for a moment, weighing his next words. Then he draws closer, leaning down slightly, and looks into your eyes. There is a subtle tremor to his voice.{/n} "When we first... began, I thought this was all a little game — a chance to stave off the boredom of being among the mon-keigh by sharing the true passions of the Aeldari with one of them. I thought your weak mon-keigh heart would quickly founder under the weight of my truths and you would flee, and then I would have a new reason to torment you... and yet here you are. And I see in your eyes the same obsession that drives me. Incredible." {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, bir anlığına tereddüt ederek ağzından çıkacak sözleri tartıyor. Ardından sana yaklaşarak hafifçe öne eğiliyor ve gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "İlk... Başladığımızda bunu küçük bir oyun olarak, mon-keighler arasında olmanın verdiği can sıkıntısını Aeldarilerin hakiki tutkularını bir tanesiyle paylaşarak atma şansı olarak görmüştüm. Mon-keigh yüreğinin hakikatimin ağırlığı altında ezileceğini ve kaçacağını, sonra da eziyet için kendime yeni bir neden edineceğimi düşünmüştüm ama... Hâlâ buradasın. Gözlerindeyse bana güç veren aynı saplantıyı görüyorum. Harika." {n}Sesi fısıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai hesitates for a moment, weighing his next words. Then he draws closer, leaning down slightly, and looks into your eyes. There is a subtle tremor to his voice.{/n} "When we first... began, I thought this was all a little game — a chance to stave off the boredom of being among the mon-keigh by sharing the true passions of the Aeldari with one of them. I thought your mon-keigh heart would quickly flounder under the weight of my truths and you would flee, and then I would have a new reason to torment you... and yet here you are. And I see in your eyes the same obsession that drives me. Incredible." {n}His voice drops to a whisper.{/n}

Başladığımızda bunu küçük bir oyun olarak, mon-keighler arasında olmanın verdiği can sıkıntısını Aeldarilerin hakiki tutkularını bir tanesiyle paylaşarak atma şansı olarak görmüştüm. Gözlerindeyse bana güç veren aynı saplantıyı görüyorum. Harika." {n}Sesi fısıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n}
